description: Used to ingest training metrics into SageMaker. These metrics can be visualized in SageMaker Studio.

parameters.name: TrialComponentName
parameters.description: The name of the Trial Component to associate with the metrics. The Trial Component name must be entirely lowercase.

parameters.name: MetricData
parameters.description: A list of raw metric values to put. (dict) --- The raw metric data to associate with the resource. The name of the metric. The time that the metric was recorded. Step (integer) --- The metric step (epoch). The metric value.

nested_params.name: Timestamp
nested_params.description: The time that the metric was recorded.

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: Lists any errors that occur when inserting metric data.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The error code of an error that occured when attempting to put metrics.
METRIC_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: The maximum amount of metrics per resource is exceeded.
VALIDATION_ERROR: The metric data failed validation.
CONFLICT_ERROR: Multiple requests attempted to modify the same data simultaneously.

nested_items.name: MetricIndex
nested_items.description: An index that corresponds to the metric in the request.
